WITH dList AS (SELECT DATE_PART('MONTH', a1.gen_dt) AS xaxis_m , user_type , COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM t_inference_info a1 INNER JOIN (SELECT user_id , 'USER' AS user_type FROM t_user_info UNION ALL SELECT hospital_id AS user_id , 'HOSPITAL' AS user_type FROM t_hospital_info) a2 ON a1.user_id = a2.user_id WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_PART('YEAR', a1.gen_dt)::varchar = #{search_year} GROUP BY xaxis_m , user_type)
SELECT t1.user_type , t1.xaxis_m , COALESCE(t2.cnt, 0) AS cnt FROM (SELECT generate_series AS xaxis_m , 'USER' AS user_type FROM generate_series(1,12)) t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN dList t2 ON t1.xaxis_m = t2.xaxis_m AND t2.user_type = t1.user_type
